knimeNode.name: Word Vector Model Reader
knimeNode.shortDescription: Node to read word vector models.

fullDescription.intro:
Node to read word vector models of different formats:
KNIME - Models previously saved by the Word Vector Writer Node.
Text - Models in standard text format (file ending may be .txt or .csv). Each row contains the word in the first column and the vector in the following columns with the following properties:
Column separator: single whitespace (multiple whitespace, tab and comma are not supported)
Decimal separator: dot
Binary - Compressed or uncompressed binary model like the well known Google News Vectors model.
Note that for external model formats (Text or Binary) only Word2Vec models are supported. Some compatible pretrained Word2Vec models can be found here.
fullDescription.option: The file containing the word vector model to read.
